ygData.subject: RE: The thrill of being a bard: was sonorous clounding message
ygData.msgSnippet: ... For those wondering, this bug happens (lore items disappear when dropped) when they are in a bag.  So long as you do transfers of all lore items outside of
ygData.messageBody:
> Not sure what the underlying story is on when items
> disappear and when they stay, but it'd be REAL nice
> for us to know.

For those wondering, this bug happens (lore items disappear when dropped)
when they are in a bag. So long as you do transfers of all lore items
outside of bags, even if you accidentally drop it, the item should be there
laying on the ground where you dropped it. If its in a bag when its
dropped, however, POOF!

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 31 Half Elf Bard of Qeynos
